scripts.build: npm run build:dist && rimraf output && cd dist && electron-packager ./ $npm_package_productName --out=../output --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.30.1 && cd ..
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run resource && webpack --config webpack/webpack.application.config.dev.js
scripts.build:dist: npm run clean && npm run resource && webpack --config webpack/webpack.application.config.production.js
scripts.build:local: npm run clean && npm run resource && webpack --config webpack/webpack.application.config.js
scripts.electron: npm run build:dev && cd dist && electron . && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eclint && npm run eslint
scripts.resource: cpy package.json dist && cpy lib/main.js dist && cd dist && npm install menubar && cd ..
